name: Farm Sweeper - A Friendly Game
description:
Welcome to FarmSweeper, a brand new game where you can win Real World Rewards and Cash Prizes (where available)! Join our famous character, Chelsea as she heads to the farm to find hidden animals and harvest the fields before time runs out.

This isn't your traditional slow, complicated, boring puzzle game - FarmSweeper delivers a fresh twist to the popular genre by letting you compete against players in a, fun, fast-paced, environment that will have you wanting to play till the cows come home!

Key Features:
• Use special Boosts to help clear plots and find cute animals
• Games only take about 2 minutes to play, pick up and play whenever you like
• Powered by Skillz, earn real world rewards and cash prizes (where available)
• Beautiful graphics and effects
• Practice your strategy with simple game boards
• Various modes to choose from to challenge yourself as you like

If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at contact@bigrunstudios.com

If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
